answers.answer: Yeah those can be signs of preeclampsia something like that. My doctor said of you swell up for no reason you should call your doctor right away

Feet normally swell durin pregnancy but when you hae the hands and especially the face swelling you need to inform your doctor! They may want to see you or have you have it checke out! Swelling of the face with combine swelling of hands and feet are symptoms of pre-eclampsia and being after 20 weeks could be serious!I would contact your doctor and if you can't get ahold of them I would go to the l&d to have it checked out!With pre-eclampsia symptoms you can never be to safe!
ya I would call your dr office. they may send you to l and d to get checked out!
